svg.aria-label: Grasshopper open circulatory system lateral sagittal view
svg.title: GRASSHOPPER OPEN CIRCULATORY SYSTEM - LATERAL SAGITTAL VIEW
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a grasshopper showing the open circulatory system with dorsal heart, aorta, hemocoel, tracheal system, and associated organs in lateral view for comparative anatomy study.
svg.text: GRASSHOPPER OPEN CIRCULATORY SYSTEM — LATERAL SAGITTAL VIEW

g.text: AnatoView — Grasshopper (Orthoptera) Open Circulatory System — Invertebrate Comparative Anatomy
Open circulatory system: hemolymph flows through hemocoel, not enclosed in blood vessels. Gas exchange via tracheal system, not blood.
